message:
Happy weekend <@&1424461167883194418>! The hive has been incredibly busy this week, and we've got some massive honey to share. üçØ‚ú®

## Weekly Update - 2026-02-15

**ü¶Ä OpenClaw Takes Center Stage**
OpenClaw just leveled up! It's now a first-class citizen with **auto-installation and auto-onboarding**, making it easier than ever to deploy. Plus, we've given it **web search capabilities**, so your agents can now surf the web. The new landing page makes everything cleaner and more accessible.

**üé• Video Generation: Stabilized & Standardized**
We've overhauled the video backend! Expect a **unified resolution system** across models (no more guessing aspect ratios). We also added **image-to-video support for Grok**, migrated Wan to a more stable setup, and added smart fallbacks. Creating moving pictures just got a whole lot smoother.

**ü¶ú Polly Gets an API**
Our favorite assistant is growing up! **Polly now has an OpenAI-compatible API service**, meaning you can plug her directly into your existing workflows. She's also smarter with upgraded embeddings and better security against prompt leakage. 

**üõ†Ô∏è Dev Experience & Models**
- **Docs x Play**: We merged the documentation directly into the Play page 'Integrate' section. Code and docs, living in harmony.
- **New Models**: Added **ElevenLabs Scribe v2** for top-tier speech-to-text, upgraded GLM to v5, and added Qwen3Guard for safety.
- **Community Wins**: Welcome 'Nova Defense' and 'Convince the CRAZY Idol' to the app showcase! üéÆ

Keep building, keep blooming. See you in the showcase! üå∏
